name: LifeRoot.bat
description:
Exposition:

Have you ever thought about the meaning of life? The main idea of our game is a person who is looking for the meaning of life. We approach the universal tree of life where all information is stored as in a computer. Accordingly, with the help of the terminal, we will look for an answer to the question: "What is the meaning of life?"

Controls:

  • WASD - movement
  • Shift - dash
  • Q - hook
  • LMB - meelee
  • E - ranged attack

This game was created as a part of GGJ 2023
